alert.note: Alert for Eastern Preston; Eastern Tucker; Preston; Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston; Western Tucker (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 07 at 3:33AM EST until January 08 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations up to 5 inches and ice accumulations around a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of southwest and western Pennsylvania and northern West Virginia. * WHEN...Until 1 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Preston; Eastern Tucker; Preston; Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston; Western Tucker
